title: Peerio
signupIntro: Peerio yengeri enyangu nobukuumi kungeri yokusinddikamu obubaka, gabana fayilo eno, atte otereke ebiwanddiko ku mutimbangano. buli kintu kibuzabuzidya nga tekinasingikibwa mu banga,kati tewali muntu yena naye gwe naabo bogabana nabo bebalina olukisa ku bwino wo
loginFailedText: bwoba okozesa passiwaadi ya divayisi, watu gezako okukozesa passiwaadinyo enkulu
infoAlertPassphrase:
kulwobukumi, Peerio ekozesa passiwadi enkulu yona ezimbidwa.

gwe weka amanyi passiwadi enkulu eno Woo gibuza ojakubanga tokyasobola ku yingila mu akaunti yo. Tukukubiliza okuwandika masita passiwadi yo kulupapula oba okugii teleka mutelekelo lya passiwadi enkulu.
infoAlertPassphraseMobile: kulwobugumu bwebyokwerinda ,peerio ekozesa passiwaadi yonna eba elondedwa nga passiwaadi enkulu. gwe wekka amanyi passiwadi eno, bwekubulako,ojja kuba tosobolera dala  kudamu kukozesa akawunta enno. tukusaba owandike passiwadi  yo enkulu kulupapula, oba ojitereke mukifo ekyekusiffu
signupPassphraseConfirmText:
• passiwadi enkulu eno gwe weka agimanyi
  • Wogibuza ebikwatako bijakubula bangalyona
  • Teleka passiwadi yo enkulu mukifo ekyekusifu

    • Bambi yingiza passiwaddi yo enkulu osobole okweyongele yo
registerAccountErrorText: Tukwetondera, tetusobodde kuwandisa akawunta yo mu kisera kino. Tukusaba otandike buto Perio oluvanyuma lwobudakika obutono
signupAccountConfirmationEmail: Tukusaba okebera akawunta ya email yo olabe obubaka omuli enamba ekakasa akawunta yo ku Peerio ogiyingeza mu wansi. Bwoba tolina bubaka bwolaba tukusaba okebere mu kabokise ka spam mu email yo.
signupAccountConfirmationPhone: Enamba ekakasa akawunta yo ewerezeddwa ku SMS ku namba yo.<strong> Tukusaba okakase nga enamba yeyo entufu era nga ne kodi ye'nsi yo ogitaddeko.<strong>
signupConfirmationCodeExpiredText: Kodi yo ekakasa akawunta eyiseko. Tukusaba otandike buto Peerio ogezeko buto okuyingira mu akawunta yo.
signupPeerioPIN: Mukifokyo kuyingizamu passiwaddi enkulu buli lwo yingila, osubola okulonda passiwaddi enyimpi esobola oku kolela ku device enoyoka. Naye kasita welabila device passiwaddi yo osobola okukozesa passiwaddi yo enkulu okutekamu endala.  Ojakwetaganga passiwaddi yo enkulu buli lwo yingira mu device empya.
accountRateLimitedText: Akawunta eno tesobola kufunibwa mu sawa eno kubanga ekoze okusaba kungi ku server. Watu guminkiriza ko odemu ogezeko.
accountBlacklistedText: acaunta eno nzigale bwoba oyagala kujigulawo tukirira support@peerio.com
computerTimeSyncText: wabaddewo obuzibu  era obubaka bwo tebugenze. kino bwekiddamu, tunulako ku ssawa olabe oba eteledde
welcomeToAccount: Webale kuja mu akawunta yo eya peerio
welcomeToAccountText: Peerio okusobozesa okuweereza obubakabwo mu bukuumi obwenjawulo,okuteleka n`okumaneginga fayilozo.
welcomeToAccountList1: <engumu>yongelamu kontakiti</engumu> nga olondako kontakiti tab .nyiga akapesa akali ku kkono
welcomeToAccountList2: tandiika emboozi ,ng'onyiga akapesa akatandika okuwandika obubaka ku ddyo. emboozi esobola okebeelamu kontakiti zonna z'oyagala. ate nga buli kimu kikuumiddwa bulungi
welcomeToAccountList3: teleka fayilozo ku Peerio nga onyiga akapesa kokuteleka ako ku ddyo. fayilozo zijja kukumibwa butilibili ate =nga osobola okuzifuna woyagalila
welcomeToAccountListSearch: awo wononyeza by'oyagala wakwanguyiza okusoma mu bubakabwo,fayilo ne kontakiti. Kigezeeko!

addContactInfoText: Okusindikika  obubaka nokugabana fayilo nemikwaano gyo kitandika nokubagata ku kontakiti zzo. mukwaano gwo bwaaba takozesa peerio, obubaka obumuyita bujja kusindikibwa kundagiriro ye. <strong>osobola okugatako omuntu nga okozesa erinya lye<strong> ,<strong> endagiriro yamayilo<strong> obaenamba yesimu <strong>

twoFactorAuthSetupText: Use your favorite authenticator app to scan the QR code below. Peerio recommends either Authy or FreeOTP. See how two-factor authentication works with Peerio.
twoFactorAuthInfoText: Two-factor authentication helps keep your account safe by requiring two different kinds of login information. Please enter the six-digit code from your mobile device to continue.

lundi gumu buli lunaku. oba efifo ekipya kakasa nti okuuma bulungi esimu yo

serverWarning_ExpireTitle: Enteekateeka yo eja kugwa kulunaku lwewa webwa.

serverWarning_PaymentError: Enteekateeka yo eya peerio tesobodwa oku za bujja kulwo'buzibu mungeri gyo koseseza okusasula. Bambi we keneenye obubaka ku akawunta yo ku https://account.peerio.com
serverWarning_QuotaExcceded: Oyisiza eterekero ! Akawunta yo eja kuba ne komo paka wogula eterekero endala oba nga ojemu fayiro mu akawunta yo
serverWarning_recoveryReminder: Okukozesa Peerio ku device endala, oja kwetaga okukozesa passwadi enkulu gyo sobola okusanga mu sentingi. Kyalira ekibanja kyafe wetugaba obuyambi Okuyiga ebisingawo.
serverWarning_recoveryReminder_mobile: Okukozesa Peerio ku device endala, oja kwetaga okukozesa passwadi enkulu gyo sobola okusanga mu sentingi. Kyalira ekibanja kyafe wetugaba obuyambi okuyiga ebisingawo. https://peerio.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/214633103
ghost_sent_msg: omuzimu buba bubaka bw'owereza omuntu atali ku Peerio, nga bwewayitawo akaseera, bubulawo
ghost_passphrase_share: emizimu milungi nnyo ku kukuuma ebyaama.oyo gw'owerezza obubaka, yetaaga passiwadi
ghost_passphrase_share_helper: Kulw'ebyokwelinda, sindika passiwadi yo kumukutu omulala.
ghost_passphrase_share_link: Tewafunye email? Oyagala kugabana n'omuntu omulala?
ghost_mobile_sent_share: emizimu milungi nnyo ku kukuuma ebyaama.oyo gw'owerezza obubaka, yetaaga passiwadi
ghost_waitUpload: Watu linddako paka nga okuteekako kuwedde.
ghost_loadFail: tosobola kulaba muzimu, ddamu olabe passiwadi
ghost_expiresAt: Obubaka buno bujja kugwaako nga : {elunaku lwebugwaako}
ghostTip: emizimu gikusobozesa okuwereza obubaka obukuumiddwa, nebwaba nga tali ku Peerio
ghost_enterMode: Woyingiza email ngo'muuntu afuna obubaka, osobola bawereza obubaka bwo'muzimu mweno engeri.
ghostOverQuota: okozesezza emizimu etaano mu mwezi gumu. genda ku Peerio pro ofuuke Ghost-whisperer osobole okuwereeza emizimu mingi nga bwoyagala
ghostOnboardText: Kati osobola ku sindikira omuntuyena obubaka, yadde tebaliku peerio! Bwo wandika obubaka, yingiza email mukifo kya contact ya peerio omuzimu gwo'bubaka gusindike obubaka bwo.<ghostLink> Yiga ebilala</>.
error_onlyPeerioUser: Obubaka bwa peerio busoboka kusindikya ku bakozesa peerio boka. okusindika ku muzimu, jjako bona abaffuna oyingizzemu endagiliro ya mail eliko
error_onlyPeerioUserFile: Mukaseela kano,fayilo mu bbaanga lyo zisobola kusindikibwa abakoseza Peerio boka.singa oyagaddeokuweleza fayilo nomuzimu,bambi jamubyona ebikwatidwaako,yingizaamu emailo entuufu omale ozisindikeyo.
error_onlyGhostUser: nga okuyingizzamu mail yo nga omuffunyi oba yingidde mu nkolayo muzimu! watu yingizamu mail yo entuffu, oba bwoba nga oyagadde okusindika obubaka bwa peerio, watu jjawo omuffunyi obaddeko oyingizzemu elinnya lya peerio
error_recipientFormat: onotusonyiwa, tetusobodde kuffuna mukozzesa wa peerio oba endagiliro ya mail yo nga eliko akakwate ku linnya eliri mu kontakiti zzo
downloadPeerioContent: <url>downloadinga apps zzaffe eza masimu ne computa za yaffesi</> kubintu ebilara nga okwekweka kwobubaka, mail, fayilo ezigabananyizidwa and obukuumu bwebanga
ghostCountUpdate: olina <okukatirizza> {omuzimu ogugenze}</> emizimu ejjigenzze mu mwezi gguno

passphrase_wrongpin: enamba yo eye kyama nkyamu, watu ddamu ogezzeko

PINSetupRequired: yingilamu mangu nga okolawo pasiwaadi ku device eno. bweba nga eno device sijjokozzesa buli kissela osobola okugenda ku mutenddela oguddako
